name: Shitbirds
description:
The number of birds in the city has increased by a lot in the past month. All of these birds shit too much and this has become a real problem. Thankfully, you are in control of your cursor that birds are afraid of. Use this to get the birds in a cage and save the city!

My first gamejam entry !:))!

This game is very laggy (!:((!), especially in the browser, so it's better to download it
